doc.previous: There is no written evidence of Proto Indo European so all knowledge of the language is derived by linguists from later languages using the comparative method and internal reconstruction
doc.after: There are several competing hypotheses about when and where PIE was spoken The Kurgan hypothesis is the single most popular model 1 2 wherein the bearers of the Kurgan culture of the Pontic steppe are the hypothesized speakers of the reconstructed Proto Indo European language 3 4 Alternative theories include an Anatolian urheimat 5 page needed and Armenian urheimat
